gov.usgs.detectionformats

Class Beam

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.detectionformats.Beam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DetectionInt

    public class Beam
extends java.lang.Object
implements DetectionInt
    a conversion class used to create, parse, and validate beam detection data
